RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 16000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 19, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BIG BELLA BROWN stalked the pace, raced on the rail through out, had a well timed clean trip, was asked at the eighth pole and willingly passed rivals on the inside getting up in time for the win. GOLD MERRITT used his natural speed and vied for the early lead on a loose rein, set the fractions willingly, showed the way almost to the wire but was caught after the sixteenth pole by a stalking closer, was able to hold on to second. LAUGHINGSAINTSSONG stalked while racing in the three path, was in contention but had no late kick. PEPPER JACK raced in the three path on the outside of another ocmpetitor, shifted out into the five path nearing the three eighths pole but made no impact late. J B GRAY broke into the two post position path, was quickly corrected, settled in along the rail and was never involved. PERFECT PERIGEE showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Big Bella Brown
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, rail, clean trip, saved ground, passed up rail late, up

ENTRY.NAME: Gold Merritt
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, rail, pace, 2w, collared 16th, held on for second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 2 7 1/2F Turf CR: 61. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500. (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at one mile and sev enty yards).

CLAIM.OWNER: Roe Steve D and Roe Patricia L

RACE.FOOTNOTES: BROADWAY PEARL was in the middle of the pack on the outside of horses in the four path, improved position along the outside by the half, was cued at the three eighths pole and willingly responded by circling the field, was encouraged in the stretch, continued to respond well and closed magnificently, finished with a lot of horse and easily got by her rivals and up for the win. DAISY DE ORO raced in the middle of the field on the rail early on, slowly but surely inched up into a stalking position, split foes nearing the three eighths pole, smartly waited for racing room leaving the turn, stayed on the rail and closed down the stretch, shifted out after the eighth pole to pass a tired rival and was kept on point and focused while still closing and earned a nice second. MARK WITH AN E was off a bit slow, trailed early on in the three path, gained ground, shifted out near the three eighths pole, shifted out again entering the upper stretch, raced six wide down the stretch, responded well to urging and encouragement, willingly closed got up in time for third. SHE'SMYSMOKESHOW vied for the early lead, raced in the two path while setting the early pace, was encouraged at the quarter pole, struggled to switch leads and tired along the rail late. CAT B CAUSE raced from off of the pace near the back of the field on the rail, settled in hands, shifted into the six path after the five sixteenth pole, had no finish. LOVELY JOYCE raced along the rail, off of the pace in the second flight of horses, maintained that position into the furlong ground, struggled to switch leads and hung late. KISS UPON A STAR was mid pack early on, raced in the three path in the third flight of horses, as cued and advanced before the half mile pole, responded well and passed horses, raced in between foes entering the turn, was within striking distance but had no late kick. PINCHING PENNIES was well off the pace, raced in the three path, improved position. THE X FACTOR raced mid pack from the three path, maintained position through out. COURT COSTS raced mid pack early on, settled in on the rail, fell back and had no rally. HOLIDAY FLOWERS was mid pack early on and racing three wide, advanced on the outside and stalked through the turn then faded. PENNIE'S MAGIC trailed through out.

ENTRY.NAME: Lovely Joyce
ENTRY.COMMENT: stlkd, rail, in contention, struggled to switch leads, hung

ENTRY.NAME: Daisy de Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, rail, split, patient, inched out late, closed well

ENTRY.NAME: Mark With an E
ENTRY.COMMENT: offslw, trailed, 3-4w, shifted out 6 wide, upper, closed

ENTRY.NAME: Court Costs
ENTRY.OWNER: Smith Mike Smith Daria and East Austin Racing Stables LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Cat B Cause
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, rail, shifted 6 wide, stretch, no finish

ENTRY.NAME: Broadway Pearl
ENTRY.COMMENT: midpck, 4w, circled turn, closed, much the best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 3 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 13750. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE DECEMBER 19, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 19, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Cl aiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLOWERSFORSHANTELL talked the early leader, launched bid at the quarter pole, challenged for the lead and took control then pulled away for the win. BEYOND THE HYPE raced from off of the pace, in the three path, moved into a stalking position on the outside, launched a bid near the quarter pole and challenged for the lead, started a battle in the stretch, was able to get to the front briefly then was caught and just missed. L G GIRL vied for the lead, set the pace, raced on the rail, was no match for the top two but held on for third. BEAUTIFULANDWILD settled off of the pace, mild improvement. BATTY two wide and was no menace. THEBOYZGALAXY raced on the rail, briefly stalked the early leaders and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: L G Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, led, rail, held on for third

ENTRY.NAME: Beyond the Hype
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, outside, 3w, bid 1/4, battled, led, missed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 4 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 89. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 19, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: REQUISITION stalked the early pace from the three path, advanced position at the seven sixteenth pole, launched a bid at the quarter pole and challenged for the lead inciting a four way battle down the lane, was urged and driven, kept on point, finally in the last few strides was able to draw off for the win. NAMESAKE stalked the leader from the three path, was keen in the bridle advanced at the half mile pole, launched a bid at the quarter pole, battled with three other rivals head to head down the lane, just missed for the win. LUNAR MODULE vied for the lead, raced on the rail, set the pace, was challenged at quarter pole, participated in a four way battle to the wire and gave way late. MALIBU S S vied for the lead, matched strides with another rival for the lead and co lead from the two path, raced in company through out, was challenged by a pair of rivals at the quarter pole, battled with those foes until deep stretch and tired late. FIRST AVENUE raced of off the pace in the three path, moved in between rivals while improving position mildly. AFLEET SKY was three wide and on the outside, but had no rally. LIONS NOT SHEEP broke through the starting gates before the start. was never involved. HARDCORE FOLKLORE trailed, showed little. BIGTIME TEGRIDY was off slow, raced on the rail but made no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Lions Not Sheep
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke through the starting gate before start, never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Requisition
ENTRY.OWNER: Riley Martin Scott Chris Carroll David and Latimer Frances
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalkd, 3w, advanced 7-16th, bid 1/4, 4way battle, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Lunar Module
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied, led, pace, battled, gave way late

ENTRY.NAME: Malibu S S
ENTRY.COMMENT: veid, led, set the fractions, battled, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Namesake
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 3w, was keen, advncd1/2, bid1/4,battled, just missed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 5 1M Turf CR: 92. Starter Allowance Purse 18000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $7,500 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 19, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (If deemed inadvisable by managem ent to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at 1 Mile and 70 Yards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MORE ICE raced from off of the pace in the three path, edged out into the five path at the half, advanced and improved position, circled the field after the three eighths pole through the turn, shifted out six wide in the upper stretch, was asked and closed with a lot of run, passed foes and drew off for the win. PAYNT BATTLE stalked the early speed from the inside of the second tier, gained g round and had to check, lost ground, settled in hands, shifted out through the turn, angled out six wide in the stretch and closed well, was able to take second place. TIO BLAS raced on the rail and saved ground through out, had the lead briefly at the top of the stretch, was challenged and tired after that. JOHNNYSJOURNEY stalked from the three path, was on the outside of the second tier, closed on the outside, made improvement and was caught late. DRIED PEPPER vied for the lead, lead, set the pace, was challenged at the quarter pole, battled then gave way. CHAPEL BARN was keen early, rated, led by the half, faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Tio Blas
ENTRY.COMMENT: rail, mid pack, advanced up rail, led stretch, battled, tired

ENTRY.NAME: More Ice
ENTRY.OWNER: Tri-Star Racing LLC and Foster Cheryl
ENTRY.COMMENT: offpace, 3w, 5 wide, 1/2, circled 3/8, 6 wide, upper, closed

ENTRY.NAME: Paynt Battle
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, rail, 2nd tier, checked 1/2 6w, stretch, closed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 6 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 13750. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE DECEMBER 19, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 19, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EGO raced four wide and off of the pace after a slow start, advanced along the outside, circled the field through the turn, entered the stretch six wide and closed well, getting up for the win. POST CLOSE stalked the leader from the three path, moved up at the half, bid at the five sixteenth pole, drifted out in the stretch but was no match for the winner but was second best. NATE'S REVENGE raced on the rail, saved ground through out, was forwardly placed early then shuffled back, had a clean trip, made up ground through the turn and closed up the rail in time to get third place. WISE GUY raced four wide, while stalking the early leader, shifted out five wide in the stretch, but to no avail. TAPPIN FORA DANCE four wide, stalked, mild improvement. HERE COMES MAGIC rail, set the pace in a set with another foe, tired late. ANICLUDE stalked the pace from the two path, shuffled back a bit, then made no impact. THE GRAY BLUR was never involved. OKUDAH vied for the lead, led in a set with another foe, then faltered. TEMPRANO trailed through out.

ENTRY.NAME: Here Comes Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: rail, led in a set, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Aniclude
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, 2w, shuffled back, made no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Tappin Fora Dance
ENTRY.OWNER: Huff Ronnie Bone Danny and Booth Danny

ENTRY.NAME: Okudah
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for the lead, led in a set, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Ego
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w, off pace, circled turn, much the best

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Jeanne Canty, Judy Hicks, Kathryn Nikkel& Pegasus Stud LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 7 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 68. Allowance Purse 31000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 19 Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHES A LUCKY REBEL wire to wire. ANITA'S VISION raced from off the pcae, improved position, closed willingly, got up for second. CERTIFIED GEM stalked, caught late. KITTENOFTHE COURT stalked, tired. EMMAS RULER trailed, passed tired rivals. REALITOS had no impact. MO BELLA showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Anita's Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, improved, closed willingly, up forced out, for second

ENTRY.NAME: Certified Gem
ENTRY.OWNER: Tri-Star Racing LLC and Joey Foster Racing & Farm LLC

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: T L Holyfield Racing Stable LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 8 7 1/2F Turf CR: 59. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500. (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be run on the main track at one mile and seventy yards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LITTLE JONY raced three wide, closed fast ws able to get up in time for the win. MONEYSTRIKE stalked from the three path, challenged for the lead, battled, then was caught late. RONALDS GATSBY mid pack, mild bid. PERIPATETIC raced mid pack from the four path, split horse, raced in between horses, gave way. CLEARLY A JET mid pack, no rally. SWEET PRESENT raced on the rail made no impact. THINKINGNDRINKING sowed little. STAR READY was forwardly placed and faltered. PIKACHU off slow, mild gain. C P'S WILD FIRE rail ,led pace, tired. PUNCHIE flashed speed and stopped.

ENTRY.COMMENT: rail, off slow, made no impact.
